isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - ADJUSTMENTS - REAR HOOD GUIDE ADJUSTMENT

svcsubproc.title: Rear Hood Guide Adjustment Up or Down on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA) and 5500 i (SFA), 5600 i (SBA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for all Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.
To adjust the hood up or down (Item 7) at the rear hood guide (Item 2) to adjust the inside of the hood with the cowl hood seal, use the following procedure.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly enough to adjust the rear hood guide (Item 2), driver side shown.

Loosen, but do not remove, the three adjustment bolts (Item 1) that secure the rear hood guide (Item 2) to the inside of the hood (Item 6). Adjust the rear hood guide up or down (Item 7) on the slotted holes to raise or lower the hood, as required, driver side shown.
Hold the rear hood guide (Item 2) in place and tighten the three adjustment bolts (Item 1), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to adjust the passenger side rear hood guide up or down.
Lower the hood to the closed position and latch the hood on each side. Check to see that the inside of the hood is contacting the cowl hood seal properly.
If further adjustment is required, repeat this procedure if room for adjustment is available.

figure.caption: Figure 61. Rear Hood Guide Adjustment on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA) and 5500 i, 5600 i (SBA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 7. ADJUST IN DIRECTION OF ARROWS UP OR DOWN

step1.para: It may be necessary to adjust the rear hood guide support (Item 1, Figure 62) up or down along with the rear hood guide (Item 2) to make the inside top of the hood contact the cowl hood seal properly. Refer to Rear Hood Guide Support Adjustment Up or Down on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA) and 5500 i (SFA), 5600 i (SBA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .
